name: Zombies vs. Towers
description:
In 2029 virus infected 99% of world population. Last human outpost fights against zombies.

We assign you as our leader to protect and defend us from zombies. Towers are filled with ammo and workers are on the way to bring even more ammo to the towers. Flow of ammo must not stop.

All eyes of the world are looking at this small outpost in the woods. As zombies crawl towards you you need to build and merge towers, upgrade them and prepare the nukes to fight agains evil zombies. Those creatures will tear as apart if we let them across the wall. Be aware of the mutant zombies, cause they can breach the wall and in- danger the human kind. Put more barb wire, spikes and even tyres on the wall to protect us from this evil zombies.

Our army is well trained and some sharpshooters are also on the towers. So don't be afraid is sometimes towers headshots the zombies.

Features:
- 9 level of towers
- unlimited ammo supply
- zombie types
- wall must stand firm
- armory upgrades
- power-ups
- nuke the zombies
- EMP zombies
- headshots mode

We really want to protect us from the zombies and protect the human kind. We hope you will take this role seriously.

Enjoy the game and let us know if we need to change anything.
